original_solution_mapping.L2: Since Cindy gave 12 marbles, then she only has 20 - 12 = <<20-12=8>>8 marbles left.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Since Lisa received 12 marbles, then Lisa has 15 + 12 = 27 marbles now.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Hence, Lisa has 27 - 8 = <<27-8=19>>19 marbles more than Cindy.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7055.
    Returns: how many more marbles Lisa has than Cindy now.
    """
    # L1
    cindy_initial_marbles = 20 # Cindy had 20 marbles
    cindy_more_than_lisa = 5 # 5 more than what Lisa had
    lisa_initial_marbles = cindy_initial_marbles - cindy_more_than_lisa

    # L2
    marbles_cindy_gave = 12 # Cindy gave her 12 marbles
    cindy_marbles_after_giving = cindy_initial_marbles - marbles_cindy_gave

    # L3
    lisa_marbles_after_receiving = lisa_initial_marbles + marbles_cindy_gave

    # L4
    lisa_more_than_cindy_now = lisa_marbles_after_receiving - cindy_marbles_after_giving

    # FA
    answer = lisa_more_than_cindy_now
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Since Cindy gave {marbles_cindy_gave} marbles, then she only has {cindy_initial_marbles} - {marbles_cindy_gave} = <<{cindy_initial_marbles}-{marbles_cindy_gave}={cindy_marbles_after_giving}>>{cindy_marbles_after_giving} marbles left.
Since Lisa received {marbles_cindy_gave} marbles, then Lisa has {lisa_initial_marbles} + {marbles_cindy_gave} = {lisa_marbles_after_receiving} marbles now.

Hence, Lisa has {lisa_marbles_after_receiving} - {cindy_marbles_after_giving} = <<{lisa_marbles_after_receiving}-{cindy_marbles_after_giving}={lisa_more_than_cindy_now}>>{lisa_more_than_cindy_now} marbles more than Cindy.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Since Lisa received 12 marbles, then Lisa has 25 + 12 = 37 marbles now.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Hence, Lisa has 37 - 8 = <<37-8=29>>29 marbles more than Cindy.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
